article.title: Raytheon Receives $55 Million Contract Modification from U.S. Navy
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Company Integrated Defense Systems, Sudbury, Massachusetts, is being awarded a $55 million contract modification to exercise an option for the production of an Aegis ashore test site AN/SPY-1D(V) Transmitter Group and MK 99 Mod 8 Fire Control System.Â The Naval Sea Systems Command, Washington Navy Yard, D.C., is the contracting activity.
